Lexicon.label: Ukrainian WordNet
Lexicon.dc:description: Ukrajinet is an open Wordnet for the Ukrainian language. It is based on the dictionaries: Vakulenko, M. O. and O. V. Vakulenko. 2017. Slovnyk fizychnykh terminiv-synonimiv [Dictionary of physical synonymous terms]. Kyjiv: VPC “Kyjivsjkyj universytet”. 191 p. (in Ukrainian). Vakulenko, M. O. and O. V. Vakulenko. 2008. Tlumachnyj slovnyk iz fizyky: [6644 statti] (Explanatory dictionary on physics: [6644 articles]). Kyjiv: Vydavnycho-polighrafichnyj centr 'Kyjivsjkyj universytet'. 767 p. The project was started in October 2022.
